title: How to stop it asking for credentials for a closed account ?
content: I've closed an account on yahoo, but still have emails on my pc. How to avoid the credentials window very single time i open thunderbird, or any of the hundreds or maybe thousands emails? "Check for new messages at startup/every X minutes" are both off. Any clues?
creator: ajina.greenteeth

title: Single trash folder
content:
As I have several eddresses I have several acounts in T'bird. However I don't care which acount an email arrives into. So I have a rule that transfers anything comming into all but one of the inboxes into one 'main' inbox. All the sub accounts are kept collapsed so I can see my main acount folders. Well and good. However when I want to trash an email I have to look which acount it came into, expand that acount, drag the email into that trash, and then collapse that acount. Selecting the rclick trash bin icon only works for emails into my main account. Is there any way I can simply trash an email from any acount - preferably into one bin?

Win 11 23H2, 128.8.0esr (64-bit), Imap

Peter
creator: 29847gv

title: Thunderbird keeps asking for password to send email
content: My wife's Thunderbird account always asks for her password whenever she sends an email. She and I use 2 different computers, both with the same version of Thunderbird, which is the latest version, both with the same build and version of Windows 11, and both with the same outgoing server settings. Yet I never have the same issue when I send emails. Can someone please help us by explaining what my wife needs to do for Thunderbird to stop asking for her password?
creator: colinbodkin

title: Unable to copy my email lists when using export function to migrate profile to new computer.
content:
Help: Unable to copy my email lists when using export function to migrate profile to new computer.

It is March 17, 2025. I am using Thunderbird 128.8.0ESR (64bit) on Windows 11 Home (version 24H2) on BOTH COMPUTERS! When I use the Thunderbird Tools Export function from my old Window 11 computer to my new Windows 11 computer it copies all my email and folders correctly. I can send and receive email fine on the new computer. However, it fails to copy over my Thunderbird address book and my email lists (the address book and lists are blank). I tried multiple times. My profile is 76GB large. So I tried navigating to C:/Users/Profiles/app data/thunderbird/roaming/profiles/profile name to perform the move manually. Still no luck.

About 2 years ago. Thunderbird versions had the ability to export address books separately. That option is no longer available. So if you know of a way to export my lists of addresses (each lists is a thousand email addresses) That would also solve the problem. -Eileen
creator: emsamitz14

title: kan geen email meer verzenden
content: kan geen email meer verzenden moest uitgaande server opnieuw instellen naar relay.scarlet.be poort 587 dit gedaan lukt ook niet ofwel blijft verzenden hangen en krijgd dan melding tijd is verlopen
creator: iqrudy

title: Problema con apertura posta PEC
content:
Thunderbird non apre email vecchia PEC. La email viene visualizzata come "vuota". Ma se viene salvata come .eml e si usa un qualunque sito o programma di lettura email .eml il contenuto e visualizzabile tranquillamente.

Debug provato:

  • Thunderbird v136.0
  • Thunderbird v128.8.0esr
  • Thunderbird v115.10.1
  • Modifica editor config mailnews.p7m_external true or false

Allego foto del email in Thunderbird e poi visualizzata in webmail o siti di lettura file .eml dove la email funziona perfettamente.

Altre tipo di pec funzionano, sembra che queste tipo di pec piu vecchia che includono un messaggio multiparte con vari allegati interni Thunderbird non riesce a visualizzarli.
creator: Neijek

title: I am trying install again the last version of thunderbird on my Windows 11 Pro (spanish version)
content:
I Unistalled the Thunderbird 64 bits in spanish that was working fine in my Windows 11 Pro, (spanish version) on my HP all in one, HP EliteOne 870 27inch G9 All in One desktop PC, and the installation program say me that I have an older system. I had installed the Thunderbird in the same computer bur I do not know what is wrong now ? I use TB from more 10 years and is frustrating this. Somebody knows how to solve this, please ? EXCUSE MY ENGHISH is very bad !

content:

other emails are correctly fetching right server details.

I have tried to enter the right server details manually. however it does not connect.

creator: ashhar.lodhi

title: Managing profiles with a third-party program
content: Hello! I am developing an application for an organization that uses Thunderbird in a Windows environment. Among other features, it is necessary to implement the transfer of mail client settings from one workstation to another. Built-in Mozilla Thunderbird tools are not suitable. I am still considering implementation options (autoconfig or direct work with files), and I have several questions. I will be very grateful for any help. 1. What is the minimum required files in the appdata folder that I need to create (transfer) so that the profile works without errors on the new workstation? No need to transfer messages, they are all on the server, and offline work is not used 2. How does the installs.ini file work? I need to avoid creating a new profile when starting Thunderbird for the first time, do I need to create an entry in installs.ini, and if so, where can I get the correct installation code? 3. Is it possible to transfer saved passwords to a new workstation? What are the requirements for this? I am very grateful for any answers
creator: sunhunter512

title: Duplicate queries
content: The last two times I have posted a query here, it was posted twice, even though (to the best of my knowledge) I only hit the 'Submit' button once. This is causing difficulties in receiving & reading replies. Is there a way I can delete the duplicate query from your system, or ask someone to do so? Many thanks.

title: How do I upgrade Thunderbird?
content:
How do I upgrade Thunderbird to the latest version?

I can no longer move emails to the folder of my choice. If I drag and drop an email into a folder it never goes there, sometimes it does nothing, sometimes the email disappears like it moved but it never ends up in the folder I drop it into, I search all the folders I have created and the email I moved is GONE! I look in the "Trash" bins I can find and the email is GONE!

Version 128.8.0esr (64-bit) I tried too update the version that is an exercise in confusion.


Side note, the only way to copy and paste the version number is using the keyboard, if you highlight the text in ABOUT, right click it does nothing! No popup window giving you the option to copy. First time in 30 years I have seen this problem.

Thanks in advance.
creator: rustyp

title: Thunderbird Calendars are muted
content: All my Thunderbird calendars are show as muted. Never had this in the past. TB version is 136.0 What is the status muted and how is it configured or controlled ?

title: Sincronizzazione da casella PEC (Postecert): non sincronizza mail inviate
content:
Buongiorno, ho appena installato la versione 115.18.0 su Windows 7 e configurato con successo il mio account pec. Al momento della sincronizzazione (prima sincronizzazione a seguito di creazione account) con il server di Poste italiane (mail.postecert.it) vedo solo le pec ricevute, e non c'è verso di poter sincronizzare le PEC inviate.

Non ho trovato risposte alla soluzione del caso, qualcuno può gentilmente aiutarmi? Grazie.

Enrico
creator: enrico.malatesta1

title: I'm suddenly unable to log into the ISP's Outgoing mail server
content:
I'm using 128.8.0esr (32-bit) Thunderbird on Windows 10. I've been using it for a very long time. Last night I was able to send and receive mail via Plusnet.

This morning I was getting the following message when I try to send:

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Authentication required. Please verify that your email address is correct in your account settings and try again."

I am the only user in this house. Nothing was changed during the night. I contacted the ISP, they checked all my account settings, none of which have been changed for a long time. All settings were as they expected. The ISP asked me to log into their web mail program and try sending mail. I was able to do this. At this point they ASSURED me that it is therefore a TBird problem.

I am a very experienced PC user. I am totally stuck for ideas.

Martin
creator: tbird4

title: Subscribing to RSS feeds in Thunderbird
content: I am trying to link RSS news feeds to my Thunderbird home page, but no websites contain the RSS icon I'm supposed to click according to the instructions. Its not on Axios, its not on Semafor, and when I type in the URL it tells me that its not valid. What am I missing? Please help !
creator: sadbrad1
